attributes.action: regulate service companies such that they cannot increase prices without first freezing salaries and bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies when needing to spend money on infrastructure first increase the price whilst at the same time increasing directors salaries and bonuses. Service should be put above profit and it should not be the end users that have to bear the brunt.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
